Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters

Class CharacterCardBean

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.CharacterCardBean
public class CharacterCardBean extends Object
This Class represents a data object that snapshots a Character card, so that it can be sent over the network to Clients

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterCardBean

      public CharacterCardBean(Character character, int totalPrice, Student excludedStudent, int memorizedModifier, int availableStopCards, StudentCollection hostedStudents)
      Constructor, initializes the bean with the card data
      Parameters:
      character - (type Character) The Character of the card
      totalPrice - (type int) The price of the card
      excludedStudent - (type Student) The Student not to consider when computing the influence
      memorizedModifier - (type int) The modifier that the card memorized
      availableStopCards - (type int) The number of stop cards that are available
      hostedStudents - (type StudentCollection) A collection of students that the card hosts for its effect
